thread.title: Great stay at the POD
thread.title_full: Great stay at the POD - Review of Pod 39 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: lisaallison11235
title: Great stay at the POD
text:
I was pleasantly surprised how much we enjoyed our 1st stay at the POD -- We knew we would not have a spacious room nor a room with a great view. However, we stayed for the weekend in an exceptionally clean room with very informative/helpful staff and had a BLAST! I would definitely return to POD 39! My 14-year old son absolutely loved the "dorm room" feel of the hotel and it most definitely met our needs. I must say, my bunk bed was VERY comfortable with soft and fluffy pillows and clean, warm covers. GREAT experience!
